const common_1 = require("@nestjs/common");
const passport_1 = require("@nestjs/passport");
const swagger_1 = require("@nestjs/swagger");
const auth_service_1 = require("../auth/auth.service");
const auth_google_service_1 = require("./auth-google.service");
const user_entity_1 = require("../users/entities/user.entity");
const auth_social_login_dto_1 = require("../auth/dto/auth-social-login.dto");
const config_1 = require("@nestjs/config");
let AuthGoogleController = class AuthGoogleController {
    constructor(authService, authGoogleService, configService) {
        this.authService = authService;
        this.authGoogleService = authGoogleService;
        this.configService = configService;
    }
    getRegister() {
        const redirectUrl = this.authGoogleService.getRedirectUrl();
        return redirectUrl;
    }
    async callback(req, res) {
        const socialData = {
            enrollType: user_entity_1.enrollType.google,
            email: req.user.email,
            password: null,
        };
        const frontUrl = this.configService.get('FRONTEND_DOMAIN');
        const userId = await this.authService.findOrCreateUser(socialData);
        res.redirect(`${frontUrl}/sign-in/social/${userId}`);
    }
};
